title: Superhero Kids Are Saving the Earth

content.en: The Earth needs a lot of help. Who can help? One man says kids can help the Earth!
content.tw: 有個人說小朋友可以幫助地球!

content.en: The man made a game for kids. The game helps them save the Earth! In this game, kids are superheroes.
content.tw: 他為小朋友設計了一個救地球的遊戲，在遊戲裡，他們都是超級英雄。

content.en: How do kids play the game? First, they make a superhero group. Superheroes are stronger together.
content.tw: 這個遊戲該怎麼玩呢? 首先小朋友們要組成超級英雄聯盟。

content.en: Then they look at their neighborhood. Can they help the Earth there? Are the parks dirty? Are there no trees or gardens?
content.tw: 他們找找看家裡附近有沒有可以幫助地球的，公園乾不乾淨，是不是沒有樹或花園。

content.en: The superheroes talk to people in their neighborhood. They learn a lot. Some people give them more help.
content.tw: 超級英雄和鄰居聊過，他們學到很多，有一些鄰居還給他們很多幫助。

content.en: The superheroes have many ideas. They make a plan and then … the superheroes have fun!
content.tw: 孩子們有很多的想法。他們訂了一個計劃。

content.en: The superheroes make parks clean and green! They plant trees! They make neighborhood gardens! They have fun together and help save the Earth!
content.tw: 孩子們綠化了公園，也把它變乾淨! 他們玩得很開心還幫助了地球!

content.en: The Earth needs many superheroes. You and your friends can be superheroes too! Play the game together.
content.tw: 地球需要很多超級英雄。你和你的朋友也可以成為超級英雄！一起玩這個遊戲吧。

vocabulary.preface: 一個好玩的遊戲，讓兒童幫地球的忙。

content.text:
1. dirty 髒的。
Wow, this beach is really dirty! 哇，這個海灘真是髒!
Yeah… It was not like this when I was little. 是啊，我小時候不是這樣的。

2. look at 看，注視。
Look at all these bottles and bags! 你看這些瓶子袋子。
Should we help clean this beach? 我們應該幫忙清理這個海灘嗎?

3. neighborhood 鄰近的區域。
No! What we should do is get everyone in this neighborhood to help out.
不，我們應該做的，是讓這個地方每個人都來幫忙清理。
That's too hard. 那太難了。

4. together 一起。
I know. But it's the only way. 我知道，不過這是唯一的辦法。
And it can be fun when people do it together. 而且大家一起做，還會很好玩呢!

vocabulary.postscript:
一起來讀今天的單字。
dirty髒的 look at注視 neighborhood鄰近的區域 together一起

title: Scientist Studies Hippie Monkeys for 40 Years

content.en: Do you like animals? Cats? Dogs? How about... monkeys?
content.tw: 你喜歡動物嗎？貓咪？狗狗？那猴子呢？

content.en: One scientist likes northern muriqui monkeys. She likes their cinnamon smell too! She likes to study these monkeys.
content.tw: 有一位科學家喜歡北絨毛蛛猴，也喜歡研究牠們。

content.en: Northern muriquis are the biggest monkeys in North and South America. They're about 150 centimeters tall. They're about 15 kilograms. Their tails are long and very strong. Their tails help them go from tree to tree.
content.tw: 這種猴子是美洲最大的猴子。身高150公分、體重15公斤。長長的尾巴讓牠們可以從一棵樹盪到另外一棵樹。

content.en: Most monkeys fight. But northern muriquis are very peaceful. They don't fight. They hug each other a lot! People call them "hippie monkeys".
content.tw: 這種猴子非常溫和。牠們不會吵架，會互相抱抱。

content.en: The scientist studies these muriquis. But she is trying to save them too. They're in very big danger!
content.tw: 這位科學家也努力拯救牠們，因為牠們現在瀕臨絕種。

content.en: One million northern muriquis lived in forests a long time ago. But people cut down many trees. They wanted to make farms. The forests became smaller and smaller. There are only 1,000 northern muriquis now. People still cut down trees.
content.tw: 很久以前，森林裡有100萬隻北絨毛蛛猴。但人類砍了很多樹，森林變得越來越小，現在只剩下1,000隻。

content.en: When forests are too small, there can be no northern muriquis.
content.tw: 森林變太小就會沒有牠們了。

content.en: The scientist has been helping the northern muriquis for 40 years now. She doesn't want to stop. There is a lot to do. Good luck!
content.tw: 這位科學家已經幫助北絨毛蛛猴40年了。她不想停下來。還有很多事情要做。祝好運！

vocabulary.preface: 美洲最大的猴子，因為棲息地縮小而面臨絕種。

content.text:
1. small 小的，smaller 更小的
What a cute monkey! 好可愛的猴子!
Yeah, it's a cotton-top tamarin. 對啊，牠叫做棉頭絹猴。
They're so small! Even smaller than a cat.

2. hug 擁抱
Don't you just want to hug them? 你不覺得很想抱抱牠們嗎?
No! I would never hug a monkey.

3. fight 打架
Hey, look, they're about to fight! 你看，牠們快要打架了!
Wow, this should be interesting to watch.

4. peaceful 和平的
I thought monkeys were peaceful animals. 我以為猴子是很和平的動物。Obviously
these two are not. 顯然這兩隻不是。

vocabulary.postscript:
我們來讀今天的單字。
smaller更小的
hug擁抱
fight打架
peaceful和平的
